thag5.4:5.1: My mentor helped me to learn,
thag5.4:5.2: hoping I would practice those teachings.
thag5.4:5.4: I’ve done what had to be done.
thag5.4:6.2: witnessing it for myself, not based on hearsay.
thag5.4:6.3: With purified knowledge, free of doubt,
thag5.4:6.4: I declare it in your presence.
thag5.4:7.3: I’ve realized my own true goal,
thag5.4:8.4: now there are no more future lives.
thag5.4:9.1: You advised me in noble observances;
thag5.4:9.3: Your instruction was not in vain—
thag5.4:9.4: I, your pupil, am fully trained.
